About me

I, Hemish Dhameliya, am a software and web designer living in Ottawa, Canada. I have a degree in Computer Application from Veer Narmad South Gujarat University in Gujarat, India. Currently, I'm enrolled at the Internet Application and Web Development of Algonquin College in Ottawa, Canada.

I am expert in Web Technologies such as HTML5 and css3. Also, I am proficient in Database technologies like MySql and Web Programming like PHP, JAVA, Asp.NET.
